title: Sensex, Nifty slide nearly 1% as falling rupee, global tensions spark risk-off trade
summary: Indian stock markets ended a difficult week with a significant drop on Friday. The rupee hit new record lows, and global tensions fueled investor caution. Shares of Adani Group companies saw a sharp decline. Broader markets also experienced substantial losses. Investors are concerned about global uncertainty and potential conflicts.

title: Three more global companies set to hop on India’s GCC train
summary: Videotelephony firm Zoom, telecom giant T-Mobile and low-cost airline Southwest Airlines are among the latest global companies considering the establishment of global capability centres (GCCs) in India, said people aware of the matter, adding that they are in talks with several states toward this end.

title: HAL, BEL, Paras Defence to Bharat Dynamics — experts recommend defence stocks to buy ahead of Budget 2026
summary: Budget 2026: Amid geopolitical tension and trade war like situation, the market experts expect rise in defence expenditure in Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget speech on February 1

title: Buy or sell: Trade guide for Nifty 50 to Sensex — Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday
summary: Buy or sell: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday — HUL, Tech Mahindra, and ONGC

title: Higher costs, capacity curbs weigh on IndiGo shares after Q3 show
summary: IndiGo's shares fell on Friday following a significant drop in quarterly profit. Brokerages offered mixed views, citing short-term challenges like rising costs and currency issues. However, many remain positive about the airline's long-term growth potential. Analysts project potential upside for the stock in the coming year, despite some caution regarding immediate future earnings.

title: Sebi accuses executives at EY, PwC of insider trading
summary: India's securities regulator has accused current and former executives from PwC, EY, Carlyle, and Advent. They allegedly breached insider trading rules concerning a 2022 Yes Bank share sale. The regulator claims unpublished price-sensitive information was shared, leading to unlawful gains. The notice follows an investigation into Yes Bank's share movements before a significant offering.

title: Adani Group stocks slide up to 14% on US SEC heat
summary: Adani Group stocks saw a sharp decline on Friday. This followed news that the US SEC is seeking court permission to email summons to founder Gautam Adani and nephew Sagar Adani. Allegations involve fraud and a bribery plot. The group's market value dropped by over $9 billion. Investors are advised to wait for clarity.

title: RBI lines up a big liquidity push amid rupee's slideshow
summary: The Reserve Bank of India has announced three liquidity-boosting measures, including open market operations and a dollar-rupee swap, totaling approximately ₹1.92 lakh crore. These actions aim to enhance system liquidity and support the transmission of previous rate cuts. Experts anticipate further liquidity injections in the coming months.

title: Stock market holiday: NSE, BSE to remain closed on Monday for Republic Day 2026
summary: Indian stock markets will be closed on January 26, 2026, for Republic Day, resuming trading on January 27. The equity and currency markets are shut, but commodity derivatives will trade in the evening. India will observe 16 trading holidays in 2026, with the next on March 3 for Holi.

title: Stocks to buy under  ₹200: Nifty 50 to Sensex — Mehul Kothari of Anand Rathi recommends three shares to buy or sell
summary: Stocks to buy under  ₹200: Mehul Kothari of Anand Rathi recommends three shares to buy or sell — IDBI Bank, IFCI, and Bank of India

title: When will the stock market stop falling?
summary: How will the Indian stock market move now? Find out…

title: SEC agrees to dismiss case over crypto lending by Winklevoss' Gemini
summary: In 2023, the SEC charged Genesis Global Capital and Gemini Trust Company with illegally selling securities to hundreds of thousands of investors through their crypto lending program.

title: Nvidia director Persis Drell resigns from board, leaves with 1,43,000 shares and stock price gain of 22,000%
summary: Nvidia Corp., the world’s most valuable company, announced the departure of director Persis Drell, who is leaving the board to “pursue a new professional opportunity.”

title: Titan’s engineering arm looks to fill equipment gap as manufacturers seek China alternatives
summary: As global disruptions create uncertainties, Titan’s engineering arm wants to build the equipment and deep-tech manufacturing layer India is missing

title: ‘Quiet-Quitting’ of US assets fuels fresh EM, gold bets
summary: Emerging-market assets and precious metals are experiencing a strong start to 2026, driven by US-Europe tensions that are weakening the dollar and encouraging global diversification. Investors are pouring record cash into emerging-market funds, with Asian technology and Latin American equities leading the rally, as a rotation out of US holdings gains momentum.

title: Ashish Kacholia reshuffles Rs 2,400 portfolio in Q3, adds 2 stocks, exits another. Check details
summary: Here is a closer look at the additions, stake increases, trims and exits made during the third quarter.

title: Adani Enterprises issues clarification, says it is not party to US legal proceedings
summary: Adani Enterprises clarified it is not involved in any legal proceedings mentioned in recent media reports, responding to inquiries from the BSE and NSE. The company emphasized there are no allegations against it, following reports of a US regulator seeking legal action against its leaders.

title: 'I don’t care about prices..': Why Robert Kiyosaki keeps buying Gold, Silver and Bitcoin
summary: Robert Kiyosaki reignited debate on X after saying he does not care about price swings in gold, silver or cryptocurrencies. The Rich Dad Poor Dad author argued that rising US debt and a weakening dollar matter more than short-term volatility, prompting him to keep buying hard assets and crypto.

title: Ashish Kacholia reshuffles Rs 2,400 crore portfolio in Q3, adds 2 stocks, exits another. Check details
summary: Here is a closer look at the additions, stake increases, trims and exits made during the third quarter.

title: Concurrent Losers: 15 small-cap stocks decline for 5 consecutive sessions
Defence, self-reliance, and budgetary priorities: Sectoral opportunities in a shifting strategic landscape
summary: India's defence sector is transforming.  A record budget and focus on domestic production are boosting capabilities.  Exports are growing, reaching over 100 countries.  New technologies and private sector involvement are key.  This presents a multi-decade opportunity for investors.  The upcoming budget is expected to further enhance capital expenditure and promote exports.

title: Auto sector shifts gears in Q3; TVS Motors, Maruti Suzuki top buys, says Siddhartha Khemka
summary: India's auto sector saw a strong Q3 recovery driven by GST cuts, festive demand, and lean inventories. Broad-based growth in two-wheelers, passenger, and commercial vehicles continued post-festive season. TVS Motor and Maruti Suzuki are highlighted for market share gains and strong growth prospects.

title: Stock to buy: Choice Broking's Sumeet Bagadia recommends this multibagger NBFC stock as his Republic Day Pick 2026
summary: Shriram Finance is recommended by Sumeet Bagadia as a top stock for Republic Day 2026, showing strong technical indicators and a recent price rally. The stock has gained 336% over five years, with targets of  ₹1,110 and  ₹1,165 advised for investors.

title: US bribery case: Adani makes first legal submission, asks court to defer ruling
summary: Gautam Adani and his nephew Sagar Adani have requested the US court to defer its ruling on the 21 January SEC motion, as their counsel and the US regulator were discussing a stipulation.

title: Budget Week Ahead: History signals caution for Nifty 50 before February 1 - What technicals suggest
summary: The Union Budget for FY26-27, set for February 1, is expected to focus on capital expenditure and growth amid global challenges. Historically, markets exhibit caution before the budget, with negative returns preceding it, while post-budget periods often see recovery and improved investor confidence.

title: This investment bank chief's pay rose 21% to $47 million for 2025, beating JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon's salary hike
summary: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. CEO David Solomon saw his biggest pay hike yet, as the investment banker's compensation for 2025 jumped by 21% to $47 million, according to reports. Here's all we know…

title: Wipro, Persistent Systems, 21 other stocks approach ex-dates for dividends, rights issues. Check details here
summary: In the upcoming week, a host of companies have announced such actions, ranging from high-percentage interim dividends to rights issues at discounted prices. The following slides provide a detailed, day-wise summary based on StockEdge data.

title: From Adcounty, TechEra to Fineotex: Ashish Kacholia adds 2 stocks, exits 1 in Q3 portfolio reshuffle
summary: Investor Ashish Kacholia adjusted his  ₹2,400 crore portfolio in the December quarter, adding stakes in Adcounty Media and TechEra Engineering. He also increased his holdings in Gujarat Apollo and Knowledge Marine while reducing investments in Vasa Denticity and Walchandnagar Industries.

title: Not just Shanghai, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang likely to visit Beijing amid surprise customs block for H200 chip
summary: Jensen Huang's annual Shanghai visit is likely to lead to a Beijing detour after Nvidia's H200 chips were met with a surprise customs block from Chinese authorities last week, as per a report. Here's what we know…

title: Chinese apps dominated Android and iOS downloads in US in 2025 — Here's how TikTok, CapCut, Temu, Shein fared
summary: Des[ite pressure from the Donald Trump administration, Chinese apps continued to dominate download list in the United States last year. Here's how ByteDance's TikTok and CapCut, and fashion retailers Temu and Shein fared.

title: Why no shareholder wants to sell the PhonePe stock?
summary: PhonePe's upcoming IPO in 2026, structured as an Offer for Sale, sees Walmart diluting 9% of its stake to meet SEBI's public shareholding requirement. Most shareholders, including founders, are retaining their investments, signaling strong confidence in the company's growth and fundamentals.

title: What is Long Term Capital Gain tax? Why do investors and other stakeholders want it removed in every budget?
summary: Ahead of the Union Budget, the debate on Long-Term Capital Gains tax intensifies. Critics argue it hinders long-term investments, reduces post-tax returns, and promotes double taxation. The effective tax rate for high earners may drive talent abroad, threatening India's economic competitiveness.

title: Govt of Singapore’s India portfolio: 11 stocks rally up to 90% in 10 months, new Q3 pick unveiled
summary: Despite the decline in overall portfolio value during FY26, stock-level performance remains encouraging. More than half of the holdings delivered positive returns, with 11 stocks surging between 25% and 90% within a span of less than 10 months in FY26.

title: Citigroup plans to lay off more employees in March — who will get impacted? Here's what report says
summary: Citigroup plans new layoffs in March after cutting 1,000 jobs in January. The cuts, affecting mainly senior staff, are part of CEO Jane Fraser's cost-reduction strategy. Details here.

title: FPIs dump Indian equities worth Rs 33,598 cr in Jan so far. Is the sentiment set to worsen further?
summary: According to VK Vijayakumar, Chief Investment Strategist at Geojit Financial Services, FPIs not only continued their selling spree in the week ended January 23 but also intensified it. The sustained outflows have wiped off Rs 16 trillion in market capitalisation for the week alone, contributing to a 2.5% decline in the Nifty index.

title: Dalal Street Week Ahead: Volatility to stay elevated, traders urged to stay nimble
summary: Markets experienced a sharp corrective move, with Nifty ending lower after a volatile week and breaking below key technical levels. India VIX surged, signaling increased risk perception. Despite a potential technical rebound due to oversold conditions, volatility is expected to remain elevated, especially with F&O expiry.

title: Adani Group clarifies on US SEC summons report; says no allegations against company
summary: Adani Group companies clarified via stock exchange filings that they are not parties to any US SEC legal proceedings. Reports indicated the SEC sought court approval to serve summons to Gautam Adani and Sagar Adani via email after Indian authorities denied previous requests. The group reiterated no allegations are against the company.

title: SBI Life-owned NBFC stock Paisalo Digital to be in focus on Tuesday; here's why
summary: Paisalo Digital has redeemed  ₹1 crore of unlisted, unsecured redeemable non-convertible debentures early, reducing long-term debt. The company redeemed 10 NCDs from Series PDL-09-2023, seven years ahead of maturity.

title: Kotak Mahindra Bank Q3 Results: Net profit rises 4% as NII and operating income improve
summary: Kotak Mahindra Bank reported a consolidated net profit of  ₹3,446 crore for Q3 FY26, a 4.3% increase from last year. Operating profit rose 4% to  ₹5,380 crore, driven by healthy net interest income growth, highlighting the bank's consistent earnings amidst a challenging banking environment.

title: Higher cement sales help UltraTech beat earnings estimates
summary: UltraTech Cement's consolidated net profit rises 27% year-on-year to  ₹ ₹1,725.40 crore in the December quarter

title: Markets passed a TACO test. Another kind of stress test is coming.
summary: One clear beneficiary of the turmoil: precious metals. Silver has been unstoppable, hitting $100 for the first time in history with a 43% year-to-date gain.

title: Why Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal thinks CEOs stepping down from their own startups is not a failure
summary: Anupam Mittal backs CEOs and founders resigning from their own startups, emphasising that founders stepping aside for professional CEOs is beneficial for companies. Details here.

title: IndiGo relinquishes over 700 slots at domestic airports after 10% cut in winter flight program
summary: The civil aviation ministry has invited other airlines to submit requests for operating domestic flights on these newly available slots

title: APSEZ to invest  ₹30,000 crore for Vizhinjam Port development: Karan Adani
summary: APSEZ will invest  ₹30,000 cr in development of Vizhinjam sea port: Karan Adani.

title: Infosys asks employees to share remote work electricity consumption data: Report
summary: Infosys is collecting data on employees' household electricity consumption to mitigate its environmental impact through clean energy. The company encourages participation in a survey aimed at enhancing sustainability initiatives, while promoting energy conservation practices at home.
